00029 
00030 class FdoXmlClassMapping;
00031 
00032 /// \brief
00033 /// FdoXmlElementMapping describes GML to FDO mappings for a particular GML Schema
00034 /// element. Only mappings that cannot be represented in FDO are described.
00035 class FdoXmlElementMapping : public FdoPhysicalElementMapping
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     /// \brief
00039     /// Constructs an object describing the GML-FDO mappings for a GML element
00040     /// 
00041     /// \param name 
00042     /// Input element name
00043     /// 
00044     /// \return
00045     /// Returns FdoXmlElementMapping
00046     /// 
00047     FDO_API static FdoXmlElementMapping* Create(
00048         GisString* name
00049     );
00050 
00051     /// \brief
00052     /// Sets the class mapping for this element. The class mapping provides
00053     /// information about the FDO Class for this element's type.
00054     /// 
00055     /// \param classMapping 
00056     /// Input the class mapping
00057     /// 
00058     FDO_API void SetClassMapping(FdoXmlClassMapping* classMapping);
00059 
00060     /// \brief
00061     /// Gets the class mapping for this element. The class mapping provides
00062     /// information about the FDO Class for this element's type.
00063     /// 
00064     /// \return
00065     /// Returns FdoXmlClassMapping.
00066     /// 
00067     FDO_API FdoXmlClassMapping* GetClassMapping();
00068 
00069     /// \brief
00070     /// Sets the element class name to a dangling reference. This function can be
00071     /// used to reference a class that has no FdoXmlClassMapping object.
00072     /// 
00073     /// \param className 
00074     /// Input name of the FDO class corresponding to the 
00075     /// element's type.
00076     /// 
00077     FDO_API void SetClassName(
00078         GisString* className
00079     );
00080 
00081     /// \brief
00082     /// Gets the FDO Class name.
00083     /// 
00084     /// \return
00085     /// Returns GisString.
00086     /// 
00087     FDO_API GisString* GetClassName();
00088 
00089     /// \brief
00090     /// Sets the schema name for a dangling reference to an element's class. 
00091     /// 
00092     /// \param schemaName 
00093     /// Input name of the Feature Schema containing the FDO class. If
00094     /// L"" then it defaults to the schema containing this element.
00095     /// 
00096     FDO_API void SetSchemaName(
00097         GisString* schemaName = L""
00098     );
00099 
00100     /// \brief
00101     /// Gets the Schema Name for the FDO Class.
00102     /// 
00103     /// \return
00104     /// Returns GisString.
00105     /// 
00106     FDO_API GisString* GetSchemaName();
00107 
00108     /// \brief
00109     /// Sets the namespace URI for this element. 
00110     /// 
00111     /// \param schemaName 
00112     /// Input a URI. Defaults to the targetNamespace
00113     /// for the schema containing this element.
00114     /// 
00115     FDO_API void SetGmlUri(
00116         GisString* gmlUri = L""
00117     );
00118 
00119     /// \brief
00120     /// Gets the URI for the referenced element. 
00121     /// 
00122     /// \return
00123     /// Returns GisString.
00124     /// 
00125     FDO_API GisString* GetGmlUri();
00126 
00127     /// \brief
00128     /// Sets the local name for this element. 
00129     /// 
00130     /// \param schemaName 
00131     /// Input the local name (unprefixed name) of this
00132     /// element. Defaults to the element name.
00133     /// 
00134     FDO_API void SetGmlLocalName(
00135         GisString* gmlLocalName = L""
00136     );
00137 
00138     /// \brief
00139     /// Gets the URI for the referenced element. 
00140     /// 
00141     /// \return
00142     /// Returns GisString. L"" if this element does not reference
00143     /// another element.
00144     /// 
00145     FDO_API GisString* GetGmlLocalName();
00146 
00147     /// Functions for XML support
00148 
00149 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00150     /// \brief
00151     /// Initializes this Xml Element Mapping from its XML attributes. Called when
00152     /// the element is deserialized from XML. 
00153     /// 
00154     /// \param pContext 
00155     /// Input context contain information about the current deserialization operation
00156     /// \param attrs 
00157     /// Input the XML attributes.
00158     /// 
00159     /// \return
00160     /// Returns nothing
00161     /// 
00162     virtual void InitFromXml(GisXmlSaxContext* pContext, GisXmlAttributeCollection* attrs);
00163 
00164     /// \brief
00165     /// Writes this XML Element Mapping to XML. Called when
00166     /// the element is serialized to XML. 
00167     /// 
00168     /// \param xmlWriter 
00169     /// Input write the element to this XML writer
00170     /// \param flags 
00171     /// Input flags that control the writing of the element.
00172     /// 
00173     /// \return
00174     /// Returns nothing
00175     /// 
00176     virtual void _writeXml(
00177         GisXmlWriter* xmlWriter, 
00178         const FdoXmlFlags* flags
00179     );
00180 /// \endcond
00181 
00182 
00183 protected:
00184 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00185     FdoXmlElementMapping() {}
00186 
00187     FdoXmlElementMapping(
00188         GisString* name
00189     );
00190 
00191     virtual ~FdoXmlElementMapping();
00192 
00193     virtual void Dispose();
00194 /// \endcond
00195 
00196 private:
00197     GisStringP                  mClassName;
00198     GisStringP                  mSchemaName;
00199     GisStringP                  mGmlUri;
00200     GisStringP                  mGmlLocalName;
00201     GisPtr<FdoXmlClassMapping>  mClassMapping;
00202 };
00203 
00204 /// \brief
00205 /// FdoXmlElementMappingP is a GisPtr on FdoXmlElementMapping, provided for convenience.
00206 typedef GisPtr<FdoXmlElementMapping> FdoXmlElementMappingP;
